pages.title: You
pages.content:
âœ… Quick Summary (Copy-Friendly)

Left Pane Functionalities:

Create

  • Create page

  • Create folder

  • Insert at the correct hierarchy

  • Auto-select new item

  • Dropdown menu: "New Page / New Folder"

Folder

  • Add folder

  • Expand/collapse

  • Rename

  • Delete

  • Drag & drop support

  • Contains nested pages/folders

Page

  • Add page

  • Rename

  • Delete

  • Open & edit

  • Drag & drop to reorder or move

  • Auto-highlight active page

Move

  • Drag & drop pages/folders

  • Move inside folders or to root

  • Instant tree refresh

  • Visual drop feedback

  • Persist updated structure

If you want, I can also prepare:

ðŸ“Œ A complete folder-page tree JSON structure
ðŸ“Œ UI layout for these features
ðŸ“Œ React component architecture for the left pane
ðŸ“Œ Drag & drop logic using React DnD or DndKit
ðŸ“Œ Database schema for pages/folders
